summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 CROSSROADS REDWOOD. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE TRAVELING AT UNKNOWN SPEEDS, THE ELECTRIC AWNING ERRONEOUSLY EXTENDED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHERE IT WAS FOUND THAT THERE MAY HAVE BEEN A POSSIBLE SHORT IN THE AWNING SYSTEM. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED ABOUT THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 5,000. THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE.
